text.div:
ServiceRequestSubjectNameSearchParameter

Parameter subject.name:string

Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ServiceRequestSubjectNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?subject:Patient.name={name}
